pullrequest.title: Add option in gui.ini to disable the use of spacenav

content.raw:
Creating a new one targeting `gazebo7` is the easiest way.

FYI, I unapproved the PR in case you'd like to make a new one targeting `gazebo7` so this one doesn't get merged. If you don't mind waiting until the next major gazebo release I'd be happy to approve/merge this one.
content.html:
Creating a new one targeting gazebo7 is the easiest way.

FYI, I unapproved the PR in case you'd like to make a new one targeting gazebo7 so this one doesn't get merged. If you don't mind waiting until the next major gazebo release I'd be happy to approve/merge this one.
